text: "Women" is a 1985 song by French singer Amanda Lear and was released as a stand-alone single. It did not chart at all and the sing is all about feminist themes. == Track listing == *7" Single :A. "Women" – 4:08 :B. "Women Wow Wow" – 3:45 == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Amanda Lear songs
title: Women (Amanda Lear song)
